explains: adj. 辅助的；备用的，后备的
n. 助手，辅助人员；外国援军士兵，雇佣兵；附属机构；志愿队；辅助舰船；助动词
wordGroup: auxiliary equipment 辅助设备，附属设备；备用设备
auxiliary shaft 副轴；辅助竖井
auxiliary function 辅助功能；辅助函数
auxiliary device 辅助装置，辅助设备；附属装置
auxiliary machine 辅助机械；备用机器
auxiliary service 附属服务设备；附属服务
auxiliary power supply 自备供电设备
auxiliary storage 辅助存储器（等于auxiliary memory）
auxiliary power unit (apu) 辅助动力单元

sentences.en: Esperanto was invented as an auxiliary language.
sentences.cn: 世界语是作为辅助语发明的。

sentences.en: Esperanto is an artificial language, designed to serve internationally as an auxiliary means of communication among speakers of different languages.
sentences.cn: 世界语是一种人造语言，目的是充当国际上不同语言使用者之间交流的辅助手段。

sentences.en: The government's first concern was to augment the army and auxiliary forces.
sentences.cn: 政府首要关注的是扩充军队与后备军。
